00005 // Description: definition of the configuration class with four parametres:
00006 // position (x,y), orientation and curvature.

00017 // ############################################################################
00018 // class SMT_Configuration
00019 // ############################################################################
00020 
00021 class SMT_Configuration : public virtual SMT_Object {
00022 public:
00023   // position, orientation (in radians, between 0 and 2pi) and curvature
00024   double x, y, theta, kappa;
00025   // constructor
00026   SMT_Configuration (double _x = 0.0, double _y = 0.0,
00027                      double _theta = 0.0, double _kappa = 0.0);
00028   // are two configurations equal?
00029   bool operator== (SMT_Configuration q);
00030   // alphanumeric display.  if EOL then end of line
00031   void print (bool eol);
00032 };
00033 
00034 
00035 // ############################################################################
00036 // non members functions
00037 // ############################################################################
00038 
00039 // cartesian distance between two configurations
00040 double configuration_distance (SMT_Configuration q1, SMT_Configuration q2);
00041 
00042 // are two configurations almost aligned?
00043 bool configuration_aligned (SMT_Configuration q1,
00044                             SMT_Configuration q2);
00045 // are two configurations almost equal?
00046 bool configuration_equal (SMT_Configuration q1, SMT_Configuration q2);
00047 
00048 #endif
